title: Printing Examples (steps In Roller Printing), 1979-9-42-a/k
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  roller-printed.
inscribed: Pattern number on paper label attached to examples, 210197. Fabrics were produced by the Waverly (lower priced) part of Schumacher.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 67.5cm (26 1/2in.). Weft(s-s). 93cm (36 1/2in.) B. Warp: 71cm (28 in.). Weft(s-s): 90cm (35 1/2in.) 
C. Warp: 68.5cm (27 in.). Weft(s-s): 91cm (35 3/4in). 
D. Warp: 68cm (26 3/4in). Weft(s-s): 90cm (35 1/2in.) E. Warp: 84cm (33in.). Weft(s-s): 89cm (35in.). 
F. Warp: 78cm (30 3/4in). Weft(s-s): 90cm (35 1/2in). G. Warp: 85cm (33 1/2in.). Weft(s-s): 89cm (35 in.). 
H. Warp: 84cm (33in.). Weft(s-s): 87.8 (34 1/2 in.). 
I. Warp: 81cm (32in.) Weft(s-s): 88.5cm (34 3/4in.) 
J. Warp: 85 cm (33in.) Weft(s-s): 89cm (35in.). 
K. Warp: 88cm (34 1/2in.). Weft(s-s): 92.8cm (36 1/2in.).
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Some of the examples in roller printing with a different example for each roller. Each sucessive example printed on top of the previous steps. Final design is a curving tree trunk with flowers and birds. A-#2- dark blue on crackle, B- #3 - plus dark grey, C- #4- plus Lt. Grey D-#5 -plus Dk. Orange, E- #6- plus Black, F-#7- plus Brown, G- #8 plus Lt. Orange, H- #9- plus Lt. Blue, I-#10- plus Gk. Green, J- #11- plus Lt. Green. K- all of the above plus yellow background and glaze.
